description:
Mule Wolflame is a young noble of Midland and member of the reborn Band of the Hawk. His primary responsibility is the protection of the medium Sonia. Proud, Mule believes strongly in personal honor.
Mule proves a quite strong close-combat fighter, as http://anidb.net/ch81093 [Isidro] notes during his fight with him in Vritannis. He is no stranger to warfare and has survived life in the battlefield. He is prepared to kill if necessary for http://anidb.net/ch660 [Griffith].
Source: Berserk Wiki
name: Mule Wolflame
